cves.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WorkDo's eCommerceGo SaaS, consisting of a stored XSS due to a lack of proper validation of user input by sending a POST request to ‘/ticket/x/conversion’, using the ‘reply_description’ parameter.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')

cves.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WorkDo's eCommerceGo SaaS, consisting of a lack of proper validation of user input by sending a POST request to ‘/store-ticket’, using the ‘subject’ and ‘description’ parameters.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')

cves.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WorkDo's TicketGo, consisting of a lack of proper validation of user input by sending a POST request to ‘/ticketgo-saas/home’, using the ‘description’ parameter.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')

cves.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WorkDo's HRMGo, consisting of a lack of proper validation of user input by sending a POST request to ‘/hrmgo/ticket/changereply’, using the ‘description’ parameter.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
